entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM MST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:11 PM MST Monday 02 January 2023
